attributes.action: ban the Daily Mail and the Daily Express and their racist neoconservative agenda
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every single morning another few million copies of these rags are printed, with headlines filled with lies, racism, homophobia, xenophobia and discrimination against anyone who is not a flag waving white middle class citizen of the UK.

Minor issues are hyped and exaggerated, triggering panic amongst readers, most of whom are 50+, scaring them from leaving the comfort of their own home. If they are so patriotic, why not talk about the GOOD points of the UK, not the bad?

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
